titles.title: David Berger Memorial Act of 2005
To make a technical correction to the Act providing for the designation of the David Berger Memorial.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 7/28/2005--Introduced. David Berger Memorial Act of 2005 - Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to revise the legislative language designating the David Berger national memorial to state that the memorial is located in northeastern Ohio. (Current legislative language states that it is located at the Jewish Community Center in Cleveland Heights, Ohio).
